## Manifest.create() method

Create a Manifest

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static create(manifest: Create): Promise<Manifest>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  manifest | Create | The manifest configuration to use |

Promise&lt;[Manifest](./opal.manifest.md)<!-- -->&gt;


## Remarks
